scripts.build:packages: npm --prefix packages/components run build && npm --prefix packages/musical-conductor run build && npm --prefix packages/host-sdk run build && npm --prefix packages/manifest-tools run build && npm --prefix packages/canvas run build && npm --prefix packages/canvas-component run build && npm --prefix packages/control-panel run build && npm --prefix packages/header run build && npm --prefix packages/library run build && npm --prefix packages/library-component run build && npm --prefix packages/real-estate-analyzer run build && npm --prefix packages/self-healing run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:packages && npm run build:host
scripts.dev:clean: npm run rebuild:mc && npm run clean:vite && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:all && npm run regenerate:ographx
scripts.analyze:catalog:all: npm run analyze:catalog:sequences && npm run analyze:catalog:topics && npm run analyze:catalog:manifests && npm run analyze:catalog:components
scripts.extract:ir:all: npm run extract:ir:handlers && npm run extract:ir:sequences && npm run extract:ir:tests
scripts.audit:full: npm run analyze:catalog:all && npm run extract:ir:all && npm run compare:catalog:vs:ir && npm run audit:comprehensive && npm run generate:proposed:tests && npm run generate:docs:advanced
scripts.artifacts:ci: npm run artifacts:build:signed && npm run artifacts:validate:strict && npm run artifacts:verify:signature && npm test && npm run artifacts:pack
scripts.pre:manifests: npm run regenerate:ographx && node scripts/generate-orchestration-domains-from-sequences.js && node scripts/gen-orchestration-diff.js && node scripts/gen-orchestration-docs.js && node scripts/gen-orchestration-project-plan.js && node scripts/generate-sprint-reports.js && node scripts/generate-canonical-hash-report.js && node scripts/generate-provenance-index.js && node scripts/generate-compliance-report.js && node scripts/advance-current-sprint.js && node scripts/generate-sprint-integrity-snapshots.js && node scripts/generate-handler-coverage.js && node scripts/generate-sprint-deltas.js && node scripts/generate-telemetry-matrix.js && node scripts/generate-sprint-telemetry-snapshots.js && node scripts/generate-release-notes.js && node scripts/generate-demo-readiness.js && node scripts/generate-telemetry-instrumentation.js && node scripts/generate-telemetry-quickstart.js && node scripts/generate-telemetry-verification.js && node scripts/generate-telemetry-complete.js && node scripts/generate-documentation-governance-framework.js && node scripts/generate-pattern-recognition-achievement.js && node scripts/generate-governance-implementation-report.js && node scripts/generate-documentation-governance-index.js && node scripts/generate-document-drift-audit.js && node scripts/generate-domain-documentation-structure.js && node scripts/allocate-documentation-files.js && node scripts/generate-domain-documentation-indexes.js && node scripts/archive-orphaned-documents.js && node scripts/generate-archive-search-index.js && node scripts/gen-context-session-docs.cjs && node scripts/sync-json-sources.js --srcRoot=catalog && npm run sync:json-components && node scripts/sync-json-sequences.js --srcRoot=catalog && node scripts/generate-json-interactions-from-plugins.js && node scripts/generate-interaction-manifest.js --srcRoot=catalog && node scripts/generate-topics-manifest.js --srcRoot=catalog && node scripts/generate-layout-manifest.js --srcRoot=catalog && node scripts/aggregate-plugins.js && node scripts/sync-plugins.js --srcRoot=catalog && node scripts/sync-control-panel-config.js && node scripts/generate-versions-manifest.js
scripts.pretest: node scripts/verify-bdd-spec.js && node scripts/verify-demo-spec.js && node scripts/verify-synthetic-telemetry.js && npm run regenerate:ographx:test-graph && node scripts/sync-json-sources.js --srcRoot=catalog && npm run sync:json-components && node scripts/sync-json-sequences.js --srcRoot=catalog && node scripts/generate-topics-manifest.js --srcRoot=catalog && node scripts/aggregate-plugins.js && node scripts/sync-plugins.js --srcRoot=catalog && node scripts/validate-shape-contracts.js && node scripts/shape-diff-check.js && node scripts/verify-shape-bdd-alignment.js && node scripts/verify-slo-dashboard-project-plan.js && node scripts/verify-bdd-assertion-completeness.js
scripts.export:setup: node scripts/run-python.js -m ensurepip --upgrade && node scripts/run-python.js -m pip install --user playwright && node scripts/run-python.js -m playwright install chromium
scripts.posttest: npm run fuse:slo:breaches && npm run compute:benefit:scores && node scripts/enforce-bdd-telemetry.js || exit 1 && node scripts/generate-shape-history.js && npm run demo:output:csv
scripts.packages:lint: npm --prefix packages/host-sdk run lint && npm --prefix packages/manifest-tools run lint
scripts.packages:clean: npm --prefix packages/host-sdk run clean && npm --prefix packages/manifest-tools run clean
scripts.ci: npm run pre:manifests && npm run lint && npm test && npm run e2e:cypress
scripts.e2e:cypress: npm run build && start-server-and-test preview http://localhost:4173 cy:run:preview
scripts.e2e:cypress:dev: npm run pre:manifests && start-server-and-test dev http://localhost:5173 cy:run
